TopicTitle: A spacecraft made using only surface atach - no snap angles either!

Articles.Content:
You read that correctly, you must build a spacecraft without using any of the node attachment placement thing and show a node display screenshot as proof.

As an extra bonus if you can do this using the KAS to build a spacecraft out of debris left behind by a previous mission.

No editor mods allowed.

There you go. Considering there weren't really any guidelines or rules, this isnt much of a challenge. Place tank radially on probe, offset tool, orbit.

 

You might want to go read the challenge posting guidelines.

wow...let me go and copy some screen shots of my.....err....."ships."

Edited January 12, 2016 by Djslime6764
